alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Hinds; Warren (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 29 at 5:24PM CST until November 29 at 6:15PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Tensas Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Southeastern Madison Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Warren County in west central Mississippi... Northern Claiborne County in southwestern Mississippi... Central Hinds County in central Mississippi... * Until 615 PM CST. * At 524 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Newman, or 12 miles southeast of Vicksburg, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Edwards around 535 PM CST. Bolton around 545 PM CST. Clinton and Brownsville around 550 PM CST. Pocahontas around 600 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Mound, Learned and Delta. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for northeastern Louisiana...and central, southwestern and west central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
